definitions.definition: The process of bringing peace and harmony ; the ending of strife .

A form of alternative dispute resolution , similar to but less formal than mediation , in which the parties bring their dispute to a neutral third party , who helps lower tensions , improve communications and explore possible solutions .

main_definition: The process of bringing peace and harmony ; the ending of strife .
secondary_definitions: ( law ) A form of alternative dispute resolution , similar to but less formal than mediation , in which the parties bring their dispute to a neutral third party , who helps lower tensions , improve communications and explore possible solutions .
